title: Kanna Varuvayaa Song Lyrics Manathil Uruthi Vendum
stanzas:
Kanna Varuvayaa Song Lyrics Manathil Uruthi Vendum
#Ilaiyaraja #KJYesudas #KSChitra

Kannaa varuvaayaa
meeraa kaetkiraal
mannan varum paadhai
mangai paarkiraal
maalai malar cholai
nadhiyoram nadandhu

unnai ingu aadaipola
yaetru kollum poo udal

Meeraa varuvaalaa
kannan kaetkiraan
maalai malar cholai
nadhiyoram nadandhu
Meeraa varuvaalaa
kannan kaetkiraan

malligai panjanai ittu
melliya sittridai thottu
mogam theerkka vaa (2)

manmadha mandhiram solli
vandhanal sundhara valli
raagam saerkkavaa(2)

kodi idai odivathan munnan
madiyinil eduthidavaa
malarvizhi mayangidum vannam
madhurasam koduthidavaa

Kannaa varuvaayaa
meeraa kaetkiraal
mannan varum paadhai
mangai paarkiraal
